name: Red Monkey
description:
Dmitry Gutov
Red Monkey. 2022. MP4, 1600x1958, 13''. Based on the painting Red Monkey (2003)

Dmitry Gutov has been one of the central figures of Russian contemporary art for more than twenty years. He is not only an artist but also a theorist, art critic, ideologist, editorial board member, and the Art Life magazine writer.
